FILE: cm552560v11.0.txt
DYAD: ZIMBABWE-SOUTH AFRICA
RIVALRY: RIV1161
DISPUTE(S): MID2570 MID2755 

PS: 19651111-19940426 0.25 19940427-20209999 0.5

PS-UPDATE2020:

PSNOTES: thompson rivalry cm552560 ,19800000 ,19920000 
I took the end of the apartheid regime as the end of the animosity between the two countries. 

PS-LAST-CHANGED: 20220320
PS-LAST-CHECKED: 20220320

Territorial-Maritime-Boundary Issues Variables

MID2570 

TERRMID: MID2570 3 -- not territory 
TERRMID-CER: MID2570 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: 

TERRLINK: MID2570 3 -- not third party link to territory 
TERRLINK-CER: MID2570 1 -- certain 
TERRLINK-NOTES: 

MARITMID: MID2570 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID2570 1 -- certain 
MARITMID-NOTES: 

ISLMID: MID2570 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID2570 1 -- certain 
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID2570 1 -- civil war MID
CIVWARMID-CER: MID2570 1 -- certain 
CIVWARMID-NOTES: MID2570 from Gibler 2018, South Africa launched an offensive against rebels taregteing its regime. As part of this effort, South Africa bombed targets in Zimbabwe. Coded civil war MID because this was connected to militarized rebels in Zimbabwe. 

CIVWARLINK: MID2570 3 -- not civil war link 
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID2570 1 -- certain 
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: 

COUPMID: MID2570 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID2570 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID2570 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID2570 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 

MID2755 

TERRMID: MID2755 3 -- not territory 
TERRMID-CER: MID2755 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: 

TERRLINK: MID2755 3 -- not third party link to territory 
TERRLINK-CER: MID2755 1 -- certain 
TERRLINK-NOTES: 

MARITMID: MID2755 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID2755 1 -- certain 
MARITMID-NOTES: 

ISLMID: MID2755 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID2755 1 -- certain 
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID2755 1 -- civil war MID
CIVWARMID-CER: MID2755 1 -- certain 
CIVWARMID-NOTES: MID2755 from Gibler 2018, in 1988 rebels attacked South Africa from Zimbabwe. South Africa protested and soon thereafter threatened Zimbabwe. Coded civil war MID because this was connected to militarized rebel activity in Zimbabwe. 

CIVWARLINK: MID2755 3 -- not civil war link 
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID2755 1 -- certain 
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: 

COUPMID: MID2755 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID2755 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID2755 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID2755 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 

RIVNOTES: The RIV is in the context of the apartheid regime in South Africa, and the Mugabe regime in Zimbabwe.

SOURCES: Gibler, D.M. 2018. Militarized Interstate Dispute Narratives, 1816-2010. Langham, MD: Rowman and Littlefield.
